level.heading: Requirement of license.
level.text: Except as provided in ยง 26-303 no person, including a person doing so on May 12, 1998, shall engage in the business of cashing checks for consideration without first obtaining a license from the Superintendent [Commissioner] pursuant to this chapter. No separate license under this chapter shall be required for any agent of a licensee.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-111
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-301.
